channel.title: How do I make it so Admins Can't trade or lose items?
channel.description: Hello, Currently Owner status and admin status can do the same commands. I would like to make it so they can't give items away. Aka remove trade from them and make it so they don't lose items. Thanks for the help all. Base is 317 Delta.

item.title: How do I make it so Admins Can't trade or lose items?
item.dc:creator: @runescapepkserver runescapepkserver
item.description:
@runescapepkserver wrote:

Hello, Currently Owner status and admin status can do the same commands. I would like to make it so they can’t give items away. Aka remove trade from them and make it so they don’t lose items. Thanks for the help all.
Base is 317 Delta.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make it so Admins Can't trade or lose items?
